verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Shackled by a heavy burden
'Neath a load of guilt and shame,
Then the hand of Jesus touched me,
And now I am no longer the same.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He touched me,
Oh, He touched me,
And oh, the joy
That floods my soul!
Something happened,
And now I know,
He touched me,
And made me whole.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Since I met this blessed Saviour,
Since He cleansed
And made me whole,
I shall never cease to praise Him,
I'll shout it while eternity rolls.
